meanings.sent1: She bounced back resiliently after facing a setback.
meanings.sent2: The athlete ran resiliently towards the finish line.
meanings.sent3: The toy car resiliently kept moving despite hitting obstacles.
meanings.sent4: The tree branches swayed resiliently in the strong wind.
meanings.sent5: The candle flame flickered resiliently in the dark room.

meanings.definition: With the ability to recover quickly from difficulties
meanings.sent1: The rubber ball is resiliently able to bounce back when dropped.
meanings.sent2: The community showed a resiliently positive attitude after the storm.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so resiliently delicious that it disappeared in minutes.
meanings.sent4: Her spirit shone resiliently even in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The fabric proved resiliently strong against tears and wear.
